Bilateral conductive hearing losses.context: Bilateral conductive hearing losses with right stapedial fixation secondary to otosclerosis.

right stapedial fixation.context: Bilateral conductive hearing losses with right stapedial fixation secondary to otosclerosis.

otosclerosis.context: Bilateral conductive hearing losses with right stapedial fixation secondary to otosclerosis.

Bilateral progressive conductive hearing.context: Bilateral progressive conductive hearing losses with probable otosclerosis.

probable otosclerosis.context: Bilateral progressive conductive hearing losses with probable otosclerosis.

Endotracheal intubation.context: Endotracheal intubation carried out by Dr. X.

1% Xylocaine with epinephrine.context: Slow infiltration of the external canal accomplished with 1% Xylocaine with epinephrine.

Limited incision.context: A limited incision was made in the earlobe harvesting a small bit of fat from the earlobe that was diced and the donor site closed with interrupted sutures of 5-0 nylon.

65 Beaver blade.context: A 65 Beaver blade was used to make incision both at 12 o'clock and at 6 o'clock.

Jordan round knife.context: Jordan round knife was used to incise the tympanomeatal flap with an adequate cuff for later reapproximation.

Annulus elevator.context: An annulus elevator was used to complete the elevation beneath the annular ligament.

House curette.context: A house curette was used to takedown portions of the scutum with extreme care to avoid any inadvertent trauma to the chorda tympani.

Argon laser.context: Argon laser then used to create rosette on the posterior cruse.

Right angle hook.context: The stapes superstructure anteriorly was mobilized with a right angle hook at the incostapedial joint and the superstructure could then be downfractured.

0.6 mm piston.context: A small bit of additional footplate was removed with a right angle hook to accommodate the 0.6 mm piston.

4.25 mm slim shaft wire Teflon piston.context: The measuring device was used and a 4.25 mm slim shaft wire Teflon piston chosen.

Downbiting crimper.context: A downbiting crimper was then used to complete the attachment of the prosthesis to the incus.

Gelfoam.context: The external canal packed with small pledgets of Gelfoam and antibiotic ointment.

Antibiotic ointment.context: The external canal packed with small pledgets of Gelfoam and antibiotic ointment.
